Step-by-step setup

Welcome to Conflict Translator

We'll help you keep conversations calm and constructive across your favorite messengers.

Permissions

We request access to your messenger tabs to analyze what you type and suggest calmer responses.

Your data stays local unless you enable backend analysis.

Choose messengers

Quick tutorial

Type a message and the badge will show a conflict score.

Click the badge to see empathic, rational, or socratic alternatives.

Use the sidebar for details and history.

Test analysis

Try a message like: "I hate you" and see the suggestions.

You can change settings anytime in the extension menu.
